item.title: Marvel Rivals Season 6 Exact Release Date & Start Times—Confirmed Content & More
item.content:encoded:
Marvel Rivals Season 6 carries on the live-service shooter’s comic book story in 2026. It’s the first proper content of the new year, and it’s adding the odd brash and brutal face or two. If you’re looking for the Marvel Rivals Season 6 start date and times, Insider Gaming has everything you need to know.

It’s been a wild and exciting 12 months for Marvel Rivals. NetEase has added new characters, from Gambit to Rogue. The player count is steady—as is your aim—and 2026 signals the next era of the game.

This guide has all the Season 6 info you need.

When Does Marvel Rivals Season 6 Release?

The official Marvel Rivals Season 6 start date is locked in for January 16, giving you plenty of time to wrap up the previous season and enjoy a hearty Christmas before starting S6!

You’ve got plenty of time to stuff your face with Turkey, beverages, chocolate, and anything else you can get your holiday hands on. Once the Christmas period starts to tail off and we get into the real meat of 2026, NetEase games will drop Season 6.

The 5.5 mini-season drop was fun, but you know that these are the proper updates.

Marvel Rivals Season 6 Start Times

It’s not 100% confirmed, but based on previous, major Marvel Rivals updates, Season 6 will first begin at 2 AM PT on January 16.

This likely isn’t the first live-service season hub you’ve checked, so you know the usual factors that go into determining these start times: Previous seasons and consistency.

Here are some exact start times in key regions, using the last few Marvel Rivals seasons as our guiding light.

All Marvel Rivals Season 6 Content So Far

Deadpool is the star addition in Season 6, and there will, of course, be new maps, game modes, and much more to come.

We don’t fully know what’s arriving in Season 6 yet. However, it’s hard to ignore the incoming presence of Marvel’s savant of sarcasm. It was revealed that Deadpool was coming to Marvel Rivals in 2026—and that moment is in Marvel Rivals Season 6.

Season 6 should be a big (and loud) one, thanks to the arrival of Deadpool and other content. What are you hoping to see in the first new season of 2026? Share some ideas via the free-to-join Insider Gaming Discord Server.

If you haven’t already, read about who the Deadpool voice actor is rumored to be, and the interesting Gacha System released in 2025.

item.title: FIFA Super Soccer Codes (December 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox FIFA Super Soccer monthly redeem codes to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including special Xmas packs, and much more. 

FIFA Super Soccer, as the title suggests, is an official FIFA-sponsored Roblox experience centered around football, including attire, emotes, celebrations, and dribbling, among other talking points. Coins are the primary in-game currency and are rewarded to players after every match. The winning team, the MVP, and players who score goals earn more Coins. These Coins can be spent on various packs, however, they often cost several thousand Coins and require intense grinding. This is where active codes come in, as they can be redeemed not only for packs but also for free accessories and gear. This article covers all the active codes, inactive ones, instructions on how to redeem them, and more.

Active FIFA Super Soccer Codes

Inactive FIFA Super Soccer Codes

How To Redeem FIFA Super Soccer Codes? 

Follow these steps to redeem all the active codes: 

  • Launch FIFA Super Soccer and connect to the lobby.
  • Once inside, press the “Codes” button located in the bottom middle. 
  • Enter any code into the “Enter code here…” text box. 
  • Press the “Claim” button to redeem the code and rewards. 

More About FIFA Super Soccer Codes

The active codes will help you fill your “Customization” inventory. The Christmas Pack, or Xmas Pack is an event pack that will be removed from the game after the season concludes. You can obtain the following gears via the free Xmas Packs: 

  • Big Christmas Shoes
  • Rudolph
  • Snowball
  • Jolly Man’s Sleigh
  • Joyful Xmas
  • Xmas Lights
  • Sack of Gits
  • Christmas Tree Glasses
  • Big Santa Hat
  • Santa
  • Christmas Shoes
  • Riley’s Theme
  • Santa Hat
  • Festive Holiday
  • Nutcracker

The other claimed accessories can be found in your Customization inventory. Just press the “Customize” button to view the inventory. The free rewards will be automatically added and will be sorted into their specific category. 

FAQs on FIFA Super Soccer Codes

What are the latest codes in FIFA Super Soccer? 

bestfootball and fifasupersoccer are the latest active codes. 

When will the active codes expire?

The active codes are notorious for going invalid within a few days of their release. Players are advised to redeem all the codes in a single sitting. 

Where to find new FIFA Super Soccer codes?

You can join the game’s official Discord channel to learn about the new codes. A better option is to keep track of this article, as it’ll be updated with the latest codes.

Having fun using codes in Roblox games? Then check out the latest codes for 99 Nights in the Forest, Type Soul, and Azure Latch. Also, check out the Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: ARC Raiders Is The Insider Gaming Community’s Best Multiplayer Game Of 2025
item.content:encoded:
Multiplayer games have always been about more than just winning or losing. They’re the late-night sessions that go longer than planned, the friend you squad up with every weekend, and the moments that turn into stories you still bring up years later. Whether it’s competitive chaos or cooperative problem-solving, multiplayer experiences have a way of creating memories that single-player games simply can’t replicate.

That sense of shared experience is reflected in the voting for the Insider Gaming community’s Best Multiplayer Game of 2025. In one of the closest results of all the awards, it was clear that the community was torn between two contenders. But, in the end, it was ARC Raiders that stood out on top as the Best Multiplayer Game.

The extraction shooter from Embark Studios received 31.3% of the votes in the Insider Gaming Discord. It just beat out the other major multiplayer juggernaut of the year, Battlefield 6, which came in second at 26.8%.

Coming in a distant third were actually two games as both Peak and Split Fiction received 10.7% of the votes. They were followed by Mario Kart World at 8.9%. Other games receiving votes were Marvel Rivals, Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, and Escape From Tarkov.

Circling back on Arc Raiders, what makes the game so special? Well, just take a look at what Insider Gaming’s Grant Taylor-Hill had to say in his review.

“I was holding fire on ARC Raiders for the longest time, but I need to admit that it’s everything I’m looking for in an extraction shooter,” Taylor-Hill wrote.

“There are plenty of places to loot and explore, the resource pool is diverse, and the core concept of the game is intriguing and engaging. I’m a huge fan of the combat, which invites you to try out a range of fighting styles and approaches, and I love how accessible the game is, catering perfectly for casual players just as much as die-hard veterans of the genre.”

What do you think of the Insider Gaming Community voting ARC Raiders as the Best Multiplayer Game of 2025? What game stood out to you this year? Leave your thoughts down below and join the talk in the Insider Gaming Discord.

And for more Insider Gaming Community Awards, check out what game the readers voted as the Most Anticipated of 2026. And don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: ‘Tarkov is Made for Satisfaction, Not For Fun’, Battlestate Games Explains
item.content:encoded:
As you might know, Escape from Tarkov is one of the most soul-crushing games on the market. It’s also one of the most rewarding, provided luck is in your favor when you decide to play it. It’s the pioneering extraction shooter that popularized the genre, and for several years, it has been known as one of the most challenging titles ever made.

Recently, we caught up with Nikita Buyanov, the head of the studio at Battlestate Games, the developer behind Escape from Tarkov. As our conversation unravelled, we learned about the team’s goal when it comes to evoking emotion in players, and as it turns out, it’s not about encouraging fun.

You Don’t Play It For a Good Time

If you’ve never heard of Escape from Tarkov, you might be missing out. As the premier extraction shooter, Escape from Tarkov challenges players to load into a borderline milsim environment, accepting that a single bullet can destroy their entire session and cause them to lose everything.

But for as off-putting as that sounds, it’s a hugely satisfying game when things go right. If you go on a winning streak, you’ll be elated, and every raid that you launch in Escape from Tarkov has the potential to yield massive rewards.

It’s gambling, in a way. That’s why extraction games are so successful, and it all started with Escape from Tarkov.

Talking to Nikita Buyanov on the most recent episode of Access Granted, we learned how the team views Escape from Tarkov from an emotional perspective:

People really want to play this kind of game, they really want to play something intellectual, hard, punishing, unforgiving… Something that will actually shake their emotions, not the game for the enjoyment.

Tarkov is made for satisfaction, not for fun. Not for enjoyment.

To have a chance to get the satisfaction or to frustrate. It is what it is. It’s polarizing. You get everything or you get nothing.

It’s an honesty that is rarely seen in the industry. This is a developer acknowledging that their game can be challenging to the point of ‘not being fun’, but that’s entirely the point. It’s why Escape from Tarkov has spent so long at the top of the extraction shooter table. It knows what it is, and it delivers so perfectly on what might seem like a bizarre gameplay loop to some.

If you want to check out the full interview with Nikita, you can do so on the Insider Gaming app, available now on Android and iOS. It’s available exclusively for Insider Gaming Premium subscribers.

Have you ever played Escape from Tarkov? If you did, did you have fun? Let us know on the Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news that Fallout Shelter could be getting a reality show adaptation

item.title: Knife Arena Codes (December 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Knife Arena monthly redeem codes for December 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including release cases and much more.

Knife Arena is a fast-paced Roblox FFA battleground where players engage in knife-only combat, testing their reflexes and tactical skills in close-quarters battles. Unlike games with varied weapons and complex progression systems, success in Knife Arena hinges entirely on your blade mastery, movement precision, and split-second decision making. The game’s instant respawn system ensures continuous action, making every match an intense test of timing and precision as you dash, dodge, and deliver devastating strikes.

Progression revolves around the game’s skin collection system, where players can unlock various knife cosmetics to personalize their gameplay experience. Although knife skins and other cosmetics can be earned through regular gameplay by accumulating coins from victories and kill streaks, the fastest way to enhance your collection is by redeeming codes. While the base mechanics remain consistent, having rare knife skins adds a visual flair that helps you stand out in the arena.

Active Knife Arena Codes

  • freecase – Release Case

Expired Knife Arena Codes

As of the writing of this article, there are no expired codes, so players can redeem the active codes safely.

How To Redeem Knife Arena Codes?

Follow these steps to activate all the active codes in Knife Arena:

  1. Boot Knife Arena in Roblox
  2. Click on the setting buttons on the top-left corner
  3. Then click on the Redeem Code button shows up
  4. Type or paste the code into the text box
  5. Press redeem and enjoy the freebie

Where To Get More Knife Arena Codes?

Knife Arena codes are typically released through the game’s community and developer channels, but they don’t appear automatically in-game. The best places to catch them early are the official Discord server, where you can join discussions and see announcements before they’re widely known, the One Hit Studio (9D GAMES) Roblox group page, and their social media accounts where they post updates about the Roblox game.

Codes often come out around game milestones, major updates, or special events, but if you’re only checking sporadically, you’ll very easily miss them because no alert system tells players when a code drops—or when it stops working. The developers don’t typically announce expiration dates for codes, making it crucial to redeem them promptly. Because of this, the easiest strategy is to save this guide in your browser and check back instead of trying to monitor every source yourself.

Having fun using codes in Roblox games? Then check out the latest codes for 99 Nights in the Forest, Type Soul, and Azure Latch. Also, check out the Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: 10 Best Games You Must Play on PlayStation Plus Released in 2025
item.content:encoded:
In 2025, PlayStation Plus members can enjoy an impressive lineup of titles. Explore the vibrant streets of Night City in Cyberpunk 2077, embark on an epic journey through the breathtaking realms of God of War: Ragnarök, or face the chilling horror of Alan Wake 2. There’s something thrilling for every type of player to discover this year.

PlayStation Plus adds tons of titles to the subscription service each year, providing access to more and more games for every higher tier. Out of this massive library, some titles are certified hits, whereas some are just space fillers. Check out Insider Gaming’s top 10 picks for PlayStation Plus 2025 games below.

Top 10 PlayStation Plus Games of 2025

God of War Ragnarök

First up is the game that came out in January, a sequel to one of PlayStation’s most popular franchises, God of War. If you have played the first game, then you should definitely give Ragnarök a try as it improves on the base game immensely, adding new gameplay elements, fresh realms to explore, and a proper conclusion to the story.

High On Life

High on Life is a first-person comedy adventure developed by Squanch Games and released in 2022. It is known for its humorous narrative, filled with quirky characters and featuring talking guns as the highlights. You are tasked with saving Humanity, who is threatened by an alien cartel that wants to use them as drugs. The title is also receiving a sequel soon, so it might be the perfect time to catch up on the first game.

Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown

If you are into 2D platforming metroidvania games, then Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown might be an excellent pick for you. It features an original story in which players explore a Persian-inspired world filled with larger-than-life landmarks. You also get to use time abilities and platforming skills, which can be used to perform combos against time-corrupted enemies and other mythological creatures.

Hogwarts Legacy

If you haven’t had the chance to try Hogwarts Legacy and are a big fan of the Harry Potter franchise, then there is no better game in this list for you. Though the game’s events take place 300 years before the books and movies, it is a familiar magical world that players get to explore as a new character. It features an original story, familiar location, spell casting, crafting potions, and everything else that you love about this universe, all revolving around an original story.

Blue Prince

Blue Prince is a new indie title released in 2025 that has won the hearts of many around the globe. The critically acclaimed title takes players to Mt. Holly, a mysterious manor with shifting rooms. The player has inherited this manor and is searching for Room 46. To get to this room, players will have to go through all the doors, which lead to new and exciting chambers with their own secrets and challenges.

Cyberpunk 2077

Cyberpunk 2077 is my pick of all the games. I can tell you that I spent over 70 hours just scouring through the open world, not even finishing half of the story, with my total gameplay coming in at 140 hours. I am not a fan of first-person games; however, this title has been the best entry into the genre. The world of this game is so incredibly dense, and the characters are so well defined that you will spend most of your game exploring Night City, which, to be honest, is the real main character of the game.

Lies of P

If you are looking into testing a challenging soulslike title, then Lies of P might be more your speed. In this game, you get to play as Geppetto’s puppet, who has been tasked to slay unearthly monsters while unearthing the secrets of Krat, a city set in the Belle Epoque era. The 2023 title is Neowiz’s take on the beloved fairy tale of Pinocchio, with a dark, grim spin.

Marvel’s Spider-Man

Again, if you are a PlayStation player, then this game cannot be missed. Marvel’s Spider-Man is one of the biggest PlayStation games and also one of the best superhero games out there. It is a remastered version that features higher resolution and a higher frame rate, while offering players an original story in which they play as Peter Parker, fighting crime and iconic villains as they swing through New York.

Alan Wake 2

Alan Wake 2 is the critically acclaimed sequel to the 2010 title; however, players don’t need to play the first game to experience this mind-bending survival horror. It features Alan Wake, a writer trapped in a nightmare, and Saga Anderson, who is in the world of the living. Players get to play as two characters and even explore two locations, the majestic landscapes of Cauldron Lake and the nightmarish cityscape of the Dark Place. The game puts you in close-combat situations with various supernatural enemies, and the ultimate weapon for survival against them is the light.

Red Dead Redemption 

Red Dead Redemption is the first game in the series, even though the events of the game take place after RDR2. Players get to play as John Marston as he tracks down the last remaining members of the Van Der Linde Gang in his quest for revenge. The new version of the game offers higher resolution and a higher frame rate, making it better suited for current-gen consoles.

In other news, check out some of our guides on Blue Prince, including the Billiard Room and Dart Puzzle solutions, and how to open the Boudoir safe.

Which of these PlayStation Plus 2025 games will you be trying out? Leave a comment down below or share your thoughts in Insider Gaming Discord.
